insert into sms_template (theme, sys_code, com_code, template_content, version, insert_time_for_his, operate_time_for_his, valid_status) values (#{theme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{templateContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{insertTimeForHis,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operateTimeForHis,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{validStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sms_template set theme = #{theme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_code = #{sysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, com_code = #{comCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, template_content = #{templateContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, insert_time_for_his = #{insertTimeForHis,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operate_time_for_his = #{operateTimeForHis,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, valid_status = #{validStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where template_code = #{templateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select template_code, theme, sys_code, com_code, template_content, version, insert_time_for_his, operate_time_for_his, valid_status from sms_template where template_code = #{templateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
